# &lt;blurhash-image&gt;

HTML custom element for displaying image with [BlurHash](https://blurha.sh/).

At 2.7 KB (minified and gzipped), this library is designed to be inlined into the HTML page where a BlurHash image is displayed.

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (TOC) -->
- [Usage](#usage)
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Usage

Set up some styling:

```html
<style>
  blurhash-image {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: #888 no-repeat center;
    background-size: 100% 100%;
  }
</style>
```

Inline the script into the web page:

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (SETUP) -->


<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

Put in the image:

```html
<blurhash-image blurhash="LGF5]+Yk^6#M@-5c,1J5@[or[Q6."></blurhash-image>
```
